channel.title: KubeCon on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in KubeCon on Container Registry

item.title: KubeCon North America 2023 â€“ The Takeaways
item.description: This year’s North America edition of the KubeCon took place in Chicago. From 5th to 9th November, people all over the world came together to talk and discuss the future and direction of various CNCF projects, including Kubernetes. I was also present with colleagues and friends to represent the Harbor. During that week, I participated in two presentations and spent some time at the Harbor project booth speaking with Harbor users.
